purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE) conference scheduled for October 1-3, 2025, in Laguna Hills, California. It highlights the significance of AI in enhancing software engineering practices and invites authors to submit manuscripts on various relevant topics. The email outlines submission guidelines, important dates, and the review process for submitted papers. It also encourages participation in the AIxSE community for updates and further engagement.

infos:
Subject: IEEE AIxSE 2025 Call for Papers
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 10 Jul 2025 16:14:12 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (aka AIxSoftware)

With the recent advances of AI, we think it is the right time to address the broader impacts of AI on SE and vice versa.​ Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE) is an international forum for academia and industries to exchange visions and ideas in the state of the art and practice, as well as to identify the emerging topics and define the synergy between the research in AI and SE in general.
Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xplore’s scope and quality requirements.
Paper Submission Deadline: July 15, 2025 PT (Extended Deadline)
Workshop Paper Submission Deadline: August 20, 2025 PT
Main Conference and Workshop Registration Deadline: September 1, 2025 PT
You are invited to join the AIxSE community (https://www.aixse.org/community) to receive new announcements and notifications from the conference by email.

conf_name_candidates.evidence: IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (aka AIxSoftware) October 1-3, 2025
